title: First World War No Stim SAQ

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Respond to parts a, b, and c. Identify ONE political factor that led to the First World War. Identify ONE new technology or strategy that affected how the First World War was fought. Explain ONE way the results of the First World War influenced political developments in states outside of North America and Europe in the interwar period (1918–1939).

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Respond to parts a, b, and c. Identify ONE political factor that led to the First World War. Identify ONE new technology or strategy that affected how the First World War was fought. Explain ONE way the results of the First World War influenced political developments in states outside of North America and Europe in the interwar period (1918–1939).

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
